register.name: BaneData
register.remarks: Asset management database for Norway (scope: Norway)

register.name: Česky Prohlášení o Dráze
Czech Network Statement
register.remarks: Počet železničních tratí podle přílohy E aktuálního prohlášení o české drahy
Number of railway line as available in Annex E of current Czech Network Statement

register.name: Datenbank Feste Anlagen
banque de données des installations fixes
banca dati degli impianti fissi
register.organization: Schweizerische Bundesbahnen im Auftrag des Bundesamtes für Verkehr
Chemins de fer fédéraux suisses par ordre Office fédéral des transports
Ferrovie Federali Svizzere su incarico Ufficio federale dei trasporti
Swiss Federal Railways on behalf of Federal Office of Transport

register.name: Liste der Stationsnamen (Dienststellendokumentation)
Liste des noms des stations
Lista dei nomi delle fermate
List of station names
register.organization: Schweizerische Bundesbahnen im Auftrag des Bundesamtes für Verkehr
Chemins de fer fédéraux suisses par ordre Office fédéral des transports
Ferrovie Federali Svizzere su incarico Ufficio federale dei trasporti
Swiss Federal Railways on behalf of Federal Office of Transport
register.remarks: Official abbreviations for swiss stations, included in the "Dienststellendokumentation" of Schweizerische Bundesbahnen on behalf of Bundesamt für Verkehr. Not to be confused with the Swiss Location Identification (see the SLOID register).

register.name: Document de Référence du Réseau
Netverklaring
register.remarks: courte description et la source
korte beschrijving en de bron

register.name: Gaïa
register.remarks: infrastructure register based on ARIANE data model

register.name: Primary Location Code for the TAF/TAP TSI
register.remarks: Used for the communication between the railway undertaking and the infrastructure manager. format: country code as ISO-3366-1 + 5 digits

register.name: Railway Interchange Coding System (RICS)
register.organization: Union Internationale des Chemins de fer (UIC)
register.remarks: 4 digit codes used in various applications to identify a company involved in the railway business
https://uic.org/support-activities/it/rics

register.name: Betriebsstellenverzeichnis
register.remarks: auch/früher als DS100 oder Ril100 bezeichnet
also/former known as DS100 or Ril100

register.name: Strekningsbeskrivelse for jernbanenettet
register.remarks: Norwegian "Strekningsbeskrivelse for jernbanenettet" of BaneNOR on behalf of Jernbanedirektoratet

register.name: Subsidiary Location Code for the TAF/TAP TSI
register.remarks: Used for the communication between the railway undertakings where detailed information within a primary location is needed. format: 1 to 10 (1AN – 10AN and special characters based on extended ASCII codes)

register.name: Swiss Location Identification (SLOID)
register.organization: Schweizerische Bundesbahnen im Auftrag des Bundesamtes für Verkehr
Chemins de fer fédéraux suisses par ordre Office fédéral des transports
Ferrovie Federali Svizzere su incarico Ufficio federale dei trasporti
Swiss Federal Railways on behalf of Federal Office of Transport
register.remarks: Unique identifier of Swiss stop locations. Not to be confused with the DiDok abbreviation (see the DIDOK register).
https://opentransportdata.swiss/en/dataset/service-points-actual-date
https://opentransportdata.swiss/de/dataset/service-points-actual-date
https://opentransportdata.swiss/fr/dataset/service-points-actual-date
https://opentransportdata.swiss/it/dataset/service-points-actual-date

register.name: Služební rukověť 70
register.remarks: register of locations of SZDC infrastructure in Czech Republic

register.name: Station Numbers (STANOX)
register.remarks: STANOX codes are used in the Total Operations Processing System (TOPS), and are supposedly unique siding location numbers.

register.name: Trafikkregler for jernbanenettet
register.remarks: Norwegian traffic rules (scope: Norway)
http://orv.jbv.no/orv/doku.php?id=tjn:start

register.name: Timing Point Location (TIPLOC)
register.remarks: TIPLOCs are used by train planners to identify what time trains should arrive at, depart or pass a particular point. They are limited to seven characters.

register.name: Unified Network Objects
register.organization: Schweizerische Bundesbahnen im Auftrag des Bundesamtes für Verkehr
Chemins de fer fédéraux suisses par ordre Office fédéral des transports
Ferrovie Federali Svizzere su incarico Ufficio federale dei trasporti
Swiss Federal Railways on behalf of Federal Office of Transport

register.name: UniqueOPID
register.remarks: Code composed of country code and alphanumeric OP code to describe OP in RINF register

register.name: Universally Unique Identifier
register.remarks: As defined by the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) in RFC 9562
